#summary This will guide you through the Marble Installation for Windows in order to develop the Tonatiuh project.

= Marble - Desktop Globe =

Marble is a Virtual Globe and World Atlas that you can use to learn more about Earth: You can pan and zoom around and you can look up places and roads. A mouse click on a place label will provide the respective Wikipedia article.

= Details =


To compile marble you need CMake, a cross-platform make. You can obtain it from http://www.cmake.org/cmake/resources/software.html. Download the last version of cmake for windows, you need a version newer than 2.4. Install CMake at _C:\CMake_version_.

Now, download the source files from http://www.kde-apps.org/content/show.php/Marble+-+Desktop+Globe?content=55105 clicking on _Source download_ link. Place it into the user directory under your MSYS folder. This will typically be c:\msys\usr\home\username. Open an MSYS shell console. Navigate to your MSYS user directory and extract the archive by typing: 

{{{
tar -xvzf marble-version.tar.gz
}}}

This will create a directory called _marble-version_ in your user directory. Using the MSYS shell navigate to just created marble-version directory and type:
{{{
export QTDIR="/usr/qt"_
export PATH=$PATH:/c/CMake-version/bin
cmake -G"MinGW Makefiles" -DQTONLY=ON ../marble
make
}}}

Copy lib files to install directory:
{{{
mkdir /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/AbstractLayer/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/data/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/handlers/dgml/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/handlers/gpx/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/handlers/kml/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/parser/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/geodata/scene/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/gps/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/Projections/*.h /c/msysNuevo/usr/local/include/marble
cp src/lib/libmarblewidget.dll /local/bin
cp src/lib/libmarblewidget.dll.a /local/lib
}}}

Marble is installed, but we have to put maps data files in Tonatiuh project. If you have not Tonatiuh project created, follow procedures to  [InstallingAndConfiguringEclipseForWindows install and configurate Eclipse for Windows] and [Installing_Subversive install Subversive] to take sources from the repository. Type on the MSYS shell:

{{{
cp data/* /c/eclipse/workspace/Tonatiuh/release
}}}

or type the following if you are working on Debug mode:
{{{
cp data/* /c/eclipse/workspace/Tonatiuh/debug
}}}
